attributes.action: stop the resettlement payments made to outgoing MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs make enough money while in their positions, why should we give extra payments when they lose or give up their seats.
Ban the process of giving MPs resettlement payments.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
